definition: Nanjiao district of Datong city 大同市[Da4 tong2 shi4], Shanxi

sentences.english: Anna was born in 1923 in Ardwick, a suburb of Manchester.
sentences.chinese: 安娜於1923年出生在曼徹斯特的郊區阿德維克。

sentences.english: The majority of them lived in rural areas in Fuyang City.
sentences.chinese: 這些患兒多數住在阜陽市的郊區。

sentences.english: Outside the city centre, the largest suburban shopping areas are Gosforth and Byker.
sentences.chinese: 市中心外，格斯福斯和拜克是郊區最大的購物區。

sentences.english: Wimbledon is a suburb of London.
sentences.chinese: 溫布爾頓是倫敦的一個郊區。

sentences.english: China, Inner Mongolia, Wuhai City suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 中國，內蒙古，烏海市郊區。

sentences.english: There are plans for more building projects in many of the Jewish suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 而以政府在猶太郊區計劃開動更多的建設項目。

sentences.english: The Bani walid Green resistance has killed hundreds of Rebels at Outskirt desert.
sentences.chinese: 綠色抵抗武裝在郊區的沙漠擊斃數百名反對派。

sentences.english: He and his family live in an enormous house in the suburb.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的家人住在郊區的一所巨宅裏。

sentences.english: The Faubourg Saint-Antoine is a reservoir of people.
sentences.chinese: 聖安皁尼郊區是人民的水庫。

sentences.english: Most houses in the suburbs have big gardens.
sentences.chinese: 郊區的大部分房子都有大花園。

sentences.english: The paper starts on taking the case of Anchang village, outskirts of Changzhi in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文以山西省長治市郊區安昌村爲例展開論述。

sentences.english: The teacher's house is in the suburb where the houses are sparse.
sentences.chinese: 老師的家在郊區，那裏稀稀拉拉有幾處房子。

sentences.english: Not all malls have suffered from competition and the suburbs’ transformation.
sentences.chinese: 競爭和郊區的變革並沒有讓所有的商城都慘遭不幸。

sentences.english: A girl leans on a highway railing on the outskirts of Lubango January 14.
sentences.chinese: 一個女孩靠上了關於郊區公路欄杆盧班戈1月14日。

sentences.english: With the outskirts of Gilgit in sight, we were stopped by a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 吉爾吉特郊區在望了，我們被警察攔了下來。

sentences.english: Many rural areas around the city have been suburbanized now.
sentences.chinese: 該市四周的鄉村現在都已成爲該市的郊區了。

definition: variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
